entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character who has two fresh cuts on his face and several new bruises. He is described as 'battered and mournful-looking'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character, who has just lied about being fine when asked by Hagrid. He feels that he does not have much to complain about compared to Hagrid.

relationships.description: Hagrid says 'In the same boat, you an' me, Harry?' which implies that they are in a similar situation. He also mentions that they are both outsiders and orphans.
This relationship is the inverse of the previous one, where Harry is also in a similar situation to Hagrid. This is implied by Hagrid's statement and Harry's response.
